title: Elegant Emerald and Diamond Vanki Bangle
materials: G-H Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.
features: This exquisite bangle features a central bezel-set emerald, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The intricate openwork design showcases a modern geometric aesthetic. The secure clasp ensures comfortable wear. This piece combines traditional Vanki elements with a contemporary flair.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green from the emerald and brilliant white from the diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions. Its modern design makes it suitable for cocktail parties and formal events as well.
description: A timeless design blending traditional artistry with modern sensibilities. The high-quality emerald and diamonds offer exceptional brilliance. Crafted with precision and featuring a durable Hyderabadi polish, this bangle will be a cherished heirloom for generations. Symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
